mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member( member_level,member_id,member_pw,member_nname,member_email )VALUES( #{member_level},#{member_id},#{member_pw},#{member_nname},#{member_email} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE member_level = member_level, member_id = member_id, member_pw = member_pw, member_nname = member_nname, member_email = member_email
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tbl_member( member_num BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, member_level INT DEFAULT 1, member_id VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL UNIQUE, member_pw VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, member_nname VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL UNIQUE, member_email VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL UNIQUE )
